itemDescription: Irish writer of children's books and religious works

wikipedia_page.main: Mary Elizabeth Southwell Dudley Leathley (18 June 1818 – 22 December 1899), was a prolific Irish writer of children's books and religious works.

response: *Mary Elizabeth Southwell Dudley Leathley (1818– 1899), writer, was born in Clonmel in 1818.
*Mary Elizabeth Southwell Dudley Leathley (1818– 1899), writer, lived in Hastings until her death in 1899.
